document.full_text: orlando magic center dwight howard, who won a record third consecutive defensive player of the year award last month, headlines the nba all-defensive team, the league said on monday.
document.title: magic's howard headlines the all-defensive team
lines_and_colors: orlando magic center dwight howard, who won a record third consecutive defensive player of the year award last month, headlines the nba all-defensive team, the league said on monday.
